```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ape)
library(fdrtool)
library(patchwork)
library(rethinking)
library(rstan)
library("cowplot")
library(flextable)
library(reshape2)

options(mc.cores = detectCores())
```

```{r}
stan_data70 <- readRDS("training_set.rds")
```

```{r}
model <- rstan::stan("stan_code/model.stan", 
                      data = stan_data70, 
                      chains = 4, 
                      cores = 8, 
                      iter = 6000, 
                      seed = 468, # this line is not strictly necessary, but needed to reproduce the results
                      control = list(adapt_delta=0.99, max_treedepth = 12))

saveRDS(model, "stan_fitted/model_fitted.rds")
```
